name: Labyrinth of Tarnished Memories
description:
After the loss of his wife, a man falls into a deep depression. With no one and nothing around him to keep him stable, he decides to turn his gun on himself. In that moment, at his crossroads between life and death, we look into his mind and find the dark labyrinth it has become. 

So many hostile thoughts tell him to pull the trigger, but there are good thoughts too. Happy memories and remnants of his lost love. If he can fight off his darkest thoughts and embrace the things he has always lived for, he may just be able to survive his hardest moments.

Estimated play time is 40 minutes. Windows only (for now, at least).
